languages.text: "Веабос-6 не твоя тюрьма, а твой личный бункер. Ты — трус, который прячется от посланных Императором испытаний".
"Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Веабос-6 не твоя тюрьма, а твой личный бункер. Ты — трус, который прячется от посланных Императором испытаний".

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison, it is your personal bunker. You are a coward who is hiding from the trials bestowed by the Emperor."
"Vheabos VI is not your prison, it is your personal bunker. You are a coward who is hiding from the trials bestowed by the Emperor."
"Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."
"Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."
"Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."
"Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

languages.text: 「ヴィアボス・VIは君の監獄ではない—隠れ家だ。君は臆病者だ。皇帝陛下が与えた試練から逃げている」
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィアボス・VIは君の監獄ではない—隠れ家だ。君は臆病者だ。皇帝陛下が与えた試練から逃げている」

languages.text: "Vheabos-VI ist nicht Euer Gefängnis – es ist Euer persönlicher Bunker. Ihr seid ein Feigling, wenn Ihr Euch vor den Prüfungen versteckt, die der Imperator Euch auferlegt hat."
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos-VI ist nicht Euer Gefängnis – es ist Euer persönlicher Bunker. Ihr seid ein Feigling, wenn Ihr Euch vor den Prüfungen versteckt, die der Imperator Euch auferlegt hat."

languages.text: « Vhéabos-VI n'est pas votre prison. C'est votre refuge. Vous êtes un lâche, qui se dérobe aux épreuves que l'Empereur vous envoie. »
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Vhéabos-VI n'est pas votre prison. C'est votre refuge. Vous êtes un lâche, qui se dérobe aux épreuves que l'Empereur vous envoie. »

languages.text: «Vheabos VI no es su prisión, sino su refugio particular. Es usted un cobarde que huye de las ordalías designadas por el mismísimo Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Vheabos VI no es su prisión, sino su refugio particular. Es usted un cobarde que huye de las ordalías designadas por el mismísimo Emperador».

languages.text: “维博斯六号星根本不是你的囚牢，而是你的龟壳。你是个懦夫，你在逃避帝皇赐予你的考验。”
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “维博斯六号星根本不是你的囚牢，而是你的龟壳。你是个懦夫，你在逃避帝皇赐予你的考验。”

languages.text: "Vheabos VI senin zindanın değil, kişisel sığınağın. Sen de İmparator tarafından sana ihsan edilen duruşmalardan kaçınan ödleğin tekisin."
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI is not your prison — it is your personal bunker. You are a coward, hiding from the trials bestowed upon you by the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI senin zindanın değil, kişisel sığınağın. Sen de İmparator tarafından sana ihsan edilen duruşmalardan kaçınan bir ödleğin tekisin."
